channel.title: Martin-Rangel on Noah Mazer
channel.description: Recent content in Martin-Rangel on Noah Mazer

item.title: Martín Rangel - THINGS I'D WRITE IF THE 🌎 WERE ENDING
item.description: [COSAS QUE ESCRIBIRÍA SI EL 🌎 FUERA A ACABAR] my aunt wishes i’d see a therapist and i’m scared to see my aunt because i had an aunt before who died after years of a sickness that swallowed her like a wolf that chews up its prey in slow motion that hurts me my aunt is a doctor and insists that she treat me beyond psychotropics “you’ve suffered so much
